name: Submerged (itch) (Amerigo Gazaway)
description:
Play as an old submarine captain trying to save his sinking ship. Fix leaky pipes, put out fires, and try to survive before you end up sleeping with the fishes.

Credits

Scriptor: Kale McSpadden

Scriptor: Vidyut Basrukar

3D/2D Artist: Andrew Tuazon

UI FX: Phillip Peng

Music & SFX: Amerigo Gazaway (http://amerigomusic.com)
